structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Part-Time Work Reasons Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of reasons for part-time employment including economic, educational, health, and caregiving factors for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Other reasons
structure:Code.common:Description: Other reasons for part-time employment not covered by specific categories.

structure:Code.common:Name: Could not find a full-time job
structure:Code.common:Description: Part-time employment due to inability to find full-time work opportunities.

structure:Code.common:Name: School education or training
structure:Code.common:Description: Part-time employment to accommodate ongoing education or training commitments.

structure:Code.common:Name: Of own illness or disability
structure:Code.common:Description: Part-time employment due to personal health conditions or disabilities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Of them, looking after children or incapacitated adults
structure:Code.common:Description: Part-time employment due to caregiving responsibilities for children or incapacitated adults.
